description:
It`s the day of a summer festival at a local jinja. Ine dresses Mino in a cute yukata. Mino makes sure that Ine wears one, too. Ine looks forward to walking around the festival with Shouzou that night, but Shouzou has to spend time with the neighbors.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Grandpa and Grandma and a Summer Festival
じいさんばあさんと夏祭り
